#summary User Manual - Appendix A Quick reference

=Appendix A - <b>minimac</b> Quick Reference=

==Special characters:==

||`||define||
||$||embed||
||\||escape||
||&||push||
||^||self-reference||

==Buit-ins:==

||<b>name</b>||<b>action</b>||<b>stack effect</b>||
||{?}||expand||( token -- )||
||{+}||plus||( integer integer -- sum )||
||{++}||increment||( integer integer -- integer+1) or ( name -- )||
||{.m}||list macros||( -- )||
||{.s}||display stack||( -- )||
||{dup}||duplicate||( x -- x x )||
